rts.ensea.fr

Class ConnectionThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • rts.ensea.fr.ConnectionThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ConnectionThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class represents a thread for sending tcp packets. This class heavily rely on the Socket class. Example : thread = new ConnectionThread(socket);
    See Also:
    Socket, Thread

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConnectionThread(java.net.Socket socket)
      Constructs a client thread which send packets to an address:port chosen by the user.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Answer "echo\r\n" to the client on the socket.

      Answer a string to the client on the socket.
      DecodedPacket decodePacket()
      Decode the packet read on the socket.
      void run()
      Override the run() method from java.lang.Thread in order to Decode packet, print them on screen and then answer to the Client.
